hero.name: Falih Dzakwan Zuhdi
hero.title: Fullstack Developer
hero.bio: Transforming ideas into digital reality. I craft web applications that are not only beautiful, but also powerful and efficient. Have a vision for your project? Let's bring it to life together.

about.title: About Me
about.name: Falih Dzakwan Zuhdi
about.bio: I'm a Fullstack Developer specializing in the Next.js ecosystem, seamlessly integrating modern frontend with robust backend solutions. I focus on building efficient, secure, and user-friendly web applications. Have an exciting project idea? Let's bring it to life together!

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Have an interesting project or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out!
